CONTROLLER - Class in <Unnamed>
Controller is the fully-static class to aggregate all of the global values which need to be passed back and forth between other classes

ControlListener - Class in <Unnamed>
ControlListener is the ActionListener class that waits for the activation of a control button on the interface and executes that Control's logic when activated.

The constructor for a ControlListener

The friendly name of this control

ConversationEvent - Class in <Unnamed>
ConversationEvent is the GameEvent class that stores logic to run conversations between the player and other Creatures
ConversationEvent(String, Creature, String) - Constructor for class ConversationEvent
The constructor for a ConversationEvent
ConversationNode - Class in <Unnamed>
ConversationNode is the class to keep track of individual pieces of a ConversationEvent (being one back-and-forth) between a Creature and a Player
ConversationNode(String, Response[]) - Constructor for class ConversationNode
The constructor for a ConversationNode with no endLogic
ConversationNode(String, Response[], Runnable) - Constructor for class ConversationNode
The constructor for a ConversationNode
conversations - Variable in class Creature
The ArrayList that stores conversations that can be had with this Creature
converse(Creature) - Method in class ConversationNode
The method to display the statement that the subject says and handle the response of the Player
converse() - Method in class Creature
The method to start a conversation with this Creature
Creature - Class in <Unnamed>
Creature is the class to collect logic and variables that will be shared by all Creature subclasses
Creature(String, int, int, String) - Constructor for class Creature
The Constructor for a Creature without Items in their inventory
Creature(String, int, int, String, ArrayList<Item>) - Constructor for class Creature
The Constructor for a Creature without Items in their inventory
